properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM POST WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT POST_NO , M_ID , POST_TITLE , POST_CONTENT , POST_COUNT , POST_RECOMMEND , TO_CHAR(POST_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "POST_DATE" FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE POST_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY POST_NO DESC ) A
) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
